Package containersoftware

Class ClientLog

java.lang.Object
containersoftware.ClientLog
All Implemented Interfaces:
Database
public class ClientLog
extends Object
implements Database
This class creates and manages the Client account database

    • Register

      public boolean Register​(String user, String pass, String checkPass, String name, String email, String number, String address, String reference) throws FileNotFoundException
      Used by UI to register a client given all the info
      Parameters:
      user - the username of the new account
      pass - the password of the new account
      checkPass - a field to make sure password is entered as desired
      name - the name of the new client
      email - the email of the new client
      number - the phone number of the new client
      address - the address of the new client
      reference - a reference person of the new client
      Returns:
      a boolean expressing the success of the registration or an error pane
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException

      Parameters:

      name - the name of the client to find
      Returns:
      a boolean confirmin whether or not the client was found
